actionEnableMsgId.Wiki: The MsgID of the menu displayed when the action is enabled.

actionFailedMsgId.Wiki: The MsgID of the menu to display when the action fails.

spQualifiedPassEventFlag.Wiki: Event flags for unconditionally passing special conditions.

playerAnimId.Wiki: This is the animation ID for the action of the player character.

chrAnimId.Wiki: Anime ID at the time of action such as enemy

validDist.Wiki: The effective distance of the action.

objDummyId.Wiki: Damipoli ID that is the action position of the object

isEventKickSync.Wiki: ObjAct Whether to synchronize the events used in the execution judgment. Set to basic . It may be set to only when the actor is not important.

objAnimId.Wiki: This is the animation ID for the action of the object.

validPlayerAngle.Wiki: The effective angle of the player's action. Effective angle difference between the player's orientation vector and the orientation vector to the object

validObjAngle.Wiki: The action effective angle of the object. Effective angle difference between the action vector of the object and the character vector

chrSorbType.Wiki: It is a method of adsorbing characters during object action.

enableTreasureDelaySec.Wiki: The number of seconds from the execution of the object action to the activation of the treasure. A setting exclusively for the object type treasure box of the object act.

preActionSfxDmypolyId.Wiki: Issue SFX from this Damipoli ID before executing the object. If it is -1, start from the origin.

preActionSfxId.Wiki: SFX issued before executing the object. If it is -1, it will not be issued.
